title: Did Anne Landers say this article about aging?
subtitle: It may be quicker to give credit to every person of all ages in writing this quote.
author: Bond Huberman
vclaim: This quote can be attributed to the advice of author Anne Landers: at the age of 20, we are concerned about the opinion of others in us. At the age of 40, we don't care what they think about us. At the age of 60, we find out they never thought of us.
